timeline.message: Fix jackrabbit excpetion when repo name contains space

timeline.bodyText: Just one query - what is the intent behind using ISO9875.encode rather than UTF-8? Other than that LGTM.
timeline.author: aprajshekhar

replies.bodyText:
jackrabbit uses ISO9075.encode to handle the spaces.
https://www.mail-archive.com/users@jackrabbit.apache.org/msg05782.html
replies.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText:
That is an excellent find, bravo for being able to dig up this relatively obscure internet artifact.
Would you mind adding this link as a comment in the source code?
Also, do we need the if (repo.contains(" ")) statement? Can we just encode the string unconditionally?
replies.author: benradey
